Name: Failure-Demand-Voice-PostCall
Function: {"Version":"2022-11-25","RuleFunction":{"Operator":"OR","Operands":[{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":[[{"Type":"LIST","Value":[{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"transaction error"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"wrong charge"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"unauthorized transaction"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"missing payment"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"delayed transfer"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"account error"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"online banking issue"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"app not working"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"card not working"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"wrong interest rate"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"misinformation"},{"Type":"PLAIN","Value":"long waiting time"}]}]],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.PatternMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"CUSTOMER"},{"Type":"PatternMatchLanguageFilter","Data":"EN"}]},"Negate":false},{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":["I was charged incorrectly","There was an unauthorized transaction on my account","I'm missing a payment","The transfer was delayed","There's an error in my account","I'm having trouble with online banking","The app isn't working","My card is not working","The interest rate is not what was promised","I was given wrong information","I've been waiting too long"],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.ExactMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"CUSTOMER"}]},"Negate":false},{"Operator":"CONTAINS_ANY","Operands":["I was charged incorrectly","There was an unauthorized transaction on my account","I'm missing a payment"],"ComparisonValue":"$.ContactLens.PostCall.SemanticMatch.Transcript","FilterClause":{"LogicOperator":"AND","Filters":[{"Type":"ParticipantRole","Data":"CUSTOMER"}]},"Negate":false}]}}
